title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 600.8 - Disposal of power
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 600.8 - Disposal of power

State Regulations

They shall set forth how the applicant proposes to
utilize the power output of the project works, that is, whether for public or
private use; if for private use, by whom it is proposed to be used and for what
purpose, and if for public use, the market wherein the applicant proposes or
expects to dispose of the same. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
600.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
